thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 20 of 511
thread.title: Rachel H

author: Rachel H
title: Rachel H
text: I was skeptical at first but Fabletics allows you to skip a month if you are like me and can't afford it all the time. They do great with giving discounts and promos so I usually wait for a steal of a deal and use my credit then. When shipping was delayed they gave me -$10 off and for my birthday an additional 10% off. You can earn rewards for reviewing the products for free items as well. The quality of the clothes is what kept me coming, you can feel its not cheap! I get soo many compliments, i use the clothes for everyday use and workout wear, even comfy enough to sleep in, when i get too lazy to change :) They have very unique options to select from that keep me interested month after month.
